alert.note: Alert for Amite; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 12:42PM CDT until September 08 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern West Feliciana Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Western St. Helena Parish in southeastern Louisiana... East Feliciana Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Wilkinson County in southern Mississippi... Southwestern Amite County in southern Mississippi... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1242 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Centreville, or 21 miles west of Liberty, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Clinton, Centreville, Woodville, Slaughter, Gloster, Wilson, Norwood, Wakefield, Spillman, Darlington, Felps, and Crosby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
